page.title: 02COMMUNITY NEWS
page.content: Our school has got a community and school newspaper.The paper is called {THE RAUNDS CAROUSEL.}The newspaper is run by {MR STRATRFORD}who is a member of our school staff.The paper is posted to every house in{HARGRAVE, {STANWICK,RINGSTEAD }and{RAUNDS}by volentary pupils of our school.{MR {STRATFORD} collects his information by appealing to pupils to write about events or anything of importance.The public in the area are also asked so are local clubs.Once {MR STRATFORD} receives the information he picks out of it what he considers to be suitable for the next issue.Advertising space is also sold in the paper.This money pays for roughly half of the paper,the rest is collected by contributions. We conducted a survey and discovered that the most popular local newspaper was the {EVENING TELEGRAPH.}
